I don't think you know the definition of bullying sir by your response. It's calling out the media and holding them accountable for their lying/spin doctoring fake news garbage. He uses social media and public speaking engagements to keep it honest. Unlike the past administration, he had the media in his pocket thus the softball type q's over the last 8 yrs. i find it sad people can't support someone who actually gives a damn about the welfare of Americans and our country. Stop it already folks....united already stop the divided/ we vs them BS...

Charlie Hebdo never claimed to be a tasteful publication. It has better things to do. It has been a loud, raucous voice for freedom --from religious bigotry, and hypocrisy of all kinds. That's why they were attacked by religious bigots. That's why PEN is right to give them an award -- for guts, for making use of freedom of speech instead of self censorship.
